channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Working with tar files in .NET 8
item.description: In this post I show how to create, extract, and list tar files using the built-in tar support introduced in .NET 7, and discuss some of the limitations Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-tar-files-in-dotnet/

item.title: Using Azure Storage Queue messages with Azure Functions and [QueueTrigger]
item.description: In this post I discuss using Azure Storage Queue as a message queue and how you can process Storage Queue messages using an Azure Functions app Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/using-azure-storage-queues-with-azure-functions-and-queuetrigger/
